alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 13 at 2:22PM CDT until April 15 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CDT /5 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING TO 4 AM CDT /3 AM MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 85 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM CDT /5 PM MDT/ this evening to 4 AM CDT /3 AM MDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft. High winds could make driving difficult for motorists driving high profile vehicles such as campers, vans, and tractor trailers.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
